pullRequest.title: EQL: Add field resolution and verification
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add basic field resolution inside the Analyzer and a basic Verifier to
check for any unresolved fields

nodes.bodyText: There will be a separate PR to externalize this to QL so it can be shared across SQL and EQL.

I changed this since the data sample from existing EQL documentation uses event_type. If the default field should be changed, that is best addressed separately:

figure out what's the impact on backwards compatibility (ECS schema) and existing data
update datasets
update code (last).
why does source() need to be checked here, but isn't in some of the other hashCode and equals functions?
We may have to come back and clarify "quotes" in this message for #51443
